Description: Ostracon, section (two fragments joined) of the body of a buff-coloured pottery vessel, the fabric is grey in section, the interior is spotted with an off-white granular deposit, the exterior is covered with a light-brown slip and remains of two lines of black-painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393988) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393988)
